sub_title: Product Owner @ Deutsche Bahn  ⁌  Studying Organization & Managementstudies @ Tilburg University
summary:
Project Director/Product Owner Integration Smart Mobility with the Deutsche Bahn Group (German Railways) in Berlin. Associate panel member with Deutschlandtakt. Non-executive director of the consultancy and software firm "MontiConsul Group LLC" in Tbilisi, Georgia. 

Studying Public Administration Bsc. with Leiden University & Organizational and Behavioural Science Bsc. with Tilburg University.

Holding various certifications in project management and data science, such as the professional certificate in Data Science with IBM, PSPO-1, LSSGB and PMI-CAMP.  

📝 Follow me on Datacamp: https://www.datacamp.com/profile/melvinmontizaan 

📝 Follow me on Trailhead: https://trailblazer.me/id/melvinmontizaan

🖥️ My personal Github repo: https://github.com/montizaan

projects.title: Bosnia and Herzegovina - New business for Bosnia Project
projects.description: We are co-negotiating a new business climate for Bosnia and Herzegovina, aiming to greaten the ability for startups to settle in Bosnia. Our team, including numerous startups, is looking to invest independent entrepreneurs willing to franchise brands in Bosnia. Also we seek to empower new location development aiming to create new jobs in Sarajevo and Banja Luka.

projects.title: Enquiry into Personal Care Budget on behalf of the Dutch Ministry of Health, Welfare and Sport
projects.description: The Dutch Ministry of Health, Welfare and Sport started a new enquiry in close cooperation with the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences and the University of Amsterdam regarding the usage and current state of the Personal Health Care Budget for people under 18 years old (In Dutch: PGB-Jeugd). After a decentralisation in 2015, the National law on AWBZ has been transferred onto 3 new  municipal laws, respectively the WMO, WLZ and Jeugdwet. Our primary concern is to evaluate the decentralisation shift and the current state of the PGB in a specific region in the Netherlands (J-42 region). Our aim is to speak to various stakeholders including budget holders, municipalities and health care providers to successfully evaluatie this specific matter.

projects.title: EuroDebate2016 (Debate in the European Parliament, Brussels)
projects.description:
Together with students, two 'supporting' teachers and the European D66 office, Melvin organised an special debate with MEP (Member of the European Parliament) Gerben-Jan Gerbrandy in the European Parliament in Brussels. 

We discussed various topics that were hot during that time, including Brexit and Dieselgate (Volkswagen Scandal). This debate really helped in making our delegation more aware of European affairs and in special we were able to network with Gerben. In final, we could also proudly conclude that we got even more interested young people willing to participate in European decision making.

profile_positions.title: External Research Leader within Directorate General Youth

profile_positions.description:
Melvin operated as a all-round worker for FP-Ruys and is still available when FP-Ruys has a short term shortage on personnel. During his time, Melvin specialised in working in a dynamic and informal environment, in which he developed his collaboration skills significantly.

Ever since 2014 Melvin is accepting almost any offer of FP-Ruys. He helped FP-Ruys many times with filling the gap in administrative work and in logistical work. The administrative and logistical business he done was very diverse, from handling phone calls to entering mutations in the Exact system. Combining the total amount of time Melvin worked for FP-Ruys, he gained more than half a year work experience.

- Gained experience in working with Exact Globe (ERP) and Exact Synergy (CRM),
- Gained experience in working effectively with the Microsoft Office suite,
- Worked in a multicultural and diverse environment,
- Working for more than half a year in the postal industry.
